title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for correctly solving x ″ ( t ) = 0 or otherwise identifying turning point

x ′ (t)=v(t)=2 e −t (1−t)=0 t=1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGceaqabeaaqaaaaa aaaaWdbiqadIhagaqbaiaacIcacaWG0bGaaiykaiabg2da9iaadAha caGGOaGaamiDaiaacMcacqGH9aqpcaaIYaGaamyza8aadaahaaWcbe qaa8qacqGHsislcaWG0baaaOGaaiikaiaaigdacqGHsislcaWG0bGa aiykaiabg2da9iaaicdaaeaacaWG0bGaeyypa0JaaGymaaaaaa@4B27@

1 point is earned for correctly evaluating x(0), x(5), and x(turning point)

x(0)=0 x(1)= 2 e ≈0.736 x(5)= 10 e 5 ≈0.067 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGceaqabeaaqaaaaa aaaaWdbiaadIhacaGGOaGaaGimaiaacMcacqGH9aqpcaaIWaaabaGa amiEaiaacIcacaaIXaGaaiykaiabg2da9maalaaapaqaa8qacaaIYa aapaqaa8qacaWGLbaaaiabgIKi7kaaicdacaGGUaGaaG4naiaaioda caaI2aaabaGaamiEaiaacIcacaaI1aGaaiykaiabg2da9maalaaapa qaa8qacaaIXaGaaGimaaWdaeaapeGaamyza8aadaahaaWcbeqaa8qa caaI1aaaaaaakiabgIKi7kaaicdacaGGUaGaaGimaiaaiAdacaaI3a aaaaa@5389@

1 point is earned for the correct answer

Distance = 2 e + 2 e − 10 e 5 ≈ 1.404

Note: Max 1/3 if no turning point or turning point ignored
